text: This is a list of transfers in Serbian football for the 2015 summer transfer window. Only moves featuring a Serbian SuperLiga side are listed. The order by which the clubs are listed is equal to the classification at the end of 2014–15 Serbian SuperLiga. ==Serbian SuperLiga== ===Partizan=== In: Jevtović i Trujić prva letnja pojačanja at FK Partizan official website, 5 June 2015 Nikola Trujić ponovo među crno-belima at FK Partizan official website, 5 June 2015 Partizan potpisao Božinova!
